metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13163 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the kernel mtp usb driver. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID A-37429972.

notes.Note: sbeattie> android kernel only; affects drivers/usb/gadget/f_mtp.c

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
